description:
Downtown park view apartment steps away from the subway, across from the NY Public Library, award winning restaurants and great night life. You’ll love my place because of the cozy ambiance, amazing location and easy access to all this spectacular city has to offer. My place is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Upon entering there is a welcoming foyer leading to the bedroom on the right and bathroom on your left. The bedroom is sun-drenched, with a comfortable queen size bed and views of the park across the street. The bathroom has a shower/tub and fresh linens are provided. An open floor plan is the rest of the apartment...including a fully equipped kitchen including a breakfast hightop table and electric kettle. There is a bar leading to the living room. Two large windows allow for ample sunlight while sitting on the beyond comfortable leather sofa. You're welcome to use the record player and large flatscreen T.V. (and netflix/hulu) Wifi is included as well. For nights you just want to have a bottle of wine and enjoy the weather, there is roof access for you.

Located where Chinatown kisses the Lower East Side, this apartment is close to all you need,culture, famers markets, coffee shops, galleries restaurants and trendy nightlife

Subway and bus lines are just steps away with most places accessible by foot. Popular location makes for car service apps a breeze to secure
name: Downtown Dream on the Park
review: Cute apartment that is located right next to the subway.  A bit loud at night, but it's NYC!
